title: A Promised Land
shortDescription: A riveting, deeply personal account of history in the making—from the president who inspired us to believe in the power of democracy.
author: Barack Obama

title: Principles
shortDescription: Ray Dalio, one of the world’s most successful investors and entrepreneurs, shares the unconventional principles that he’s developed, refined, and used over the past forty years to create unique results in both life and business—and which any person or organization can adopt to help achieve their goals.
author: Ray Dalio

title: The Almanack of Naval Ravikant: A Guide to Wealth and Happiness
shortDescription: Getting rich is not just about luck; happiness is not just a trait we are born with. These aspirations may seem out of reach, but building wealth and being happy are skills we can learn.
author: Naval Ravikant

title: Tiny Habits: The Small Changes That Change Everything
shortDescription: The world’s leading expert on habit formation shows how you can have a happier, healthier life: by starting small.
author: BJ Fogg, PhD

title: The Body: A Guide for Occupants
shortDescription: Bill Bryson, best-selling author of A Short History of Nearly Everything, takes us on a head-to-toe tour of the marvel that is the human body. As addictive as it is comprehensive, this is Bryson at his very best, a must-listen owner's manual for everybody.
author: Bill Bryson
